DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immediate effect knee brace new mechanism pain medial knee load gait among medial knee osteoarthritis patient . The effect new brace compare stabilize brace typical valgus knee brace . The investigator recruit 24 knee osteoarthritis wear three brace three month . A fifteen day wash-out period give three month . Biomechanical evaluation carry three month . This evaluation consist three questionnaire ( KOOS , WOMAC Medical Outcome Score Short Form-36 ( MOS-SF36 ) ) , motion analysis optoelectronic system , 6-min walk test . During motion analysis , ten gait trial execute without brace ten brace .
